articles.title: Julia Fox defends controversial Jackie O. Halloween costume
articles.description:
Fox said she dressed up as a bloodied Jacqueline Kennedy “not as a costume, but as a statement.”

The post Julia Fox defends controversial Jackie O. Halloween costume appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Julia Fox wore a bloodied Jackie O. costume for Halloween, sparking local controversy.
Fox claimed the costume was a statement, not just a costume, during the Halloween season.
Boston residents are discussing the implications of cultural sensitivity in Halloween costumes.

articles.title: Falcons QB Michael Penix Jr., WR Drake London set to play vs. Patriots
articles.description:
Penix (knee) and London (hip) missed Atlanta’s Week 8 matchup against the Dolphins last week.

The post Falcons QB Michael Penix Jr., WR Drake London set to play vs. Patriots appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Falcons QB Michael Penix Jr. and WR Drake London will play against the Patriots on November 5.
Both players missed Atlanta's Week 8 game against the Dolphins due to injuries.
Their return could significantly impact the Patriots' defense strategy in the upcoming game.

articles.title: Plea deal ends prosecution of NH ports director and his state Supreme Court justice wife
articles.description:
He pleaded guilty to one count of violating driver privacy and was given a 30-day jail sentence, all of which was suspended.

The post Plea deal ends prosecution of NH ports director and his state Supreme Court justice wife appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: New Hampshire ports director pleaded guilty to violating driver privacy.
He received a 30-day suspended jail sentence as part of a plea deal.
The case raises concerns about accountability for public officials in the region.
